channel.title: Willkommen on CoderDojo Schöneweide
channel.description: Recent content in Willkommen on CoderDojo Schöneweide

item.title: “Welcome to CoderDojo Schöneweide”
item.description: Welcome to CoderDojo Schöneweide! Here in our blog you can follow our current projects and keep up to date with our events. We are a group of students from the HTW Berlin who have made it their goal to organize a programming workshop for children and young people between the ages of 7 and 17 at the university.
